mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_record (car_light, car_machine, car_shift, car_gas, record_time, car_id, description, mileage) VALUES (#{carLight}, #{carMachine}, #{carShift},#{carGas}, #{recordTime},#{carId}, #{description}, #{milegag})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car_record WHERE car_id = #{carId} ORDER BY record_time DESC
mapper.update: update car_record SET lamp_status = #{lampStatus} where car_id = #{id}
update car_record set engine_performance = #{enginePerformance} where car_id=#{id};
update car_record set transmission_performance = #{transmissionPerformance} where car_id=#{id};
update car_record set fuel_amount = #{fuelAmount} where car_id = #{id}
update car_record set expend_number = #{expendNumber} where car_id = #{id};
